# GetAddressRange

**Instance Method**

Returns the address and length of the memory buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t GetAddressRange(IOAddressSegment * range);
```

## Parameters

- **range**: An [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IOAddressSegment] structure that you provide. On return, this structure contains the address and length of the memory buffer.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. See [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Managing the Buffer Contents

- **SetLength**: Changes the length of the memory buffer.
- **IOAddressSegment**: A structure that describes the location and size of a block of memory.
